page.title: 10AMENITIES IN SALPERTON
page.content: There is no post office in the area. The nearest post offices are at Andoversford and Brockhampton.There is one daily postal delivery by van,with a morning and afternoon collection from the Salperton letter-box.The rural postman is always willing to take letters ready for posting when he delivers the morning mail. A mobile library calls at Salperton once a fortnight. The County Council loans a snow plough which can be attached to a farm tractor.The snow warden(a local person) keeps the roads clear in wintry conditions. There are mains supplies of water and electricity but no gas.Deliveries of domestic oil,coal and Calor gas are usually reliable. All homes depend on septic tanks for sewage disposal.
